column1: Poptún is a municipality in the El Petén department of Guatemala. It covers an area of 1
column4: 663 at the 2002 Census; the latest official estimate (as at mid-2012) was 64
column5: 988. It is some 385 km from Guatemala City. Since 1989
column6: Military Zone 23 in Poptún has been the home of the Guatemalan Army's elite Kaibiles special operations force.

column1: Poptún is in the southeast part of Petén Department and communicates with the rest of the Republic of Guatemala via a 100-km highway to Flores.
